Undergraduate Research Assistants

Sai Shankar M

Sai Shankar is a final year undergraduate student pursuing is bachelorâ€™s degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering at Rajalakshmi Engineering College. His areas of interest include Renewable energy and Micro-grids. He is currently a part of the Smart Energy group working on designing low cost and optimized micro-grids. He has recently published a paper on micro-grids at the IEEE Texas Power and Energy Conference 2018 held at Texas A&M university, Texas. He intends to pursue his Masters abroad in Electrical engineering in the fall of 2019.
